title: Seeming
content:
g, use the Dispel Disguise ability in the Common tab (icon: broken light-blue mask). It also appears on the far right of your hotbar while Seeming is active. Cast it to remove the disguise. Seeming appears to bug out Hirelings, causing you to be unable to talk to them. You have to Dispel it to get the hireling to speak to you.
